childrenComponentProp.name: visible
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If the modal is visible or not

childrenComponentProp.name: onClose
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Handler for when the modal is closed

childrenComponentProp.name: clickToClose
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Click outside modal will call onClose prop

childrenComponentProp.name: contents
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Contents of modal when displayed. You can also pass the contents as children, which is preferred

childrenComponentProp.name: cssClass
childrenComponentProp.docblock: CSS class to set on the modal

childrenComponentProp.name: id
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Id of the modal, used for aria attributes

childrenComponentProp.name: hideCloseButton
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Hide the close button that's normally in the top right

childrenComponentProp.name: focusSelector
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Selector to use to find elements to focus on when the
modal is opened
